previewArticle.title: USMNT vs. Nigeria | International Friendly Match Preview

recapArticle.title: USA 2, Nigeria 1 | International Friendly Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: We are off. The last time we'll see the #USMNT before Brazil. On ESPN. http://t.co/RJ1jGL1MQa #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Nigeria. Conceded by Fabian Johnson.

timelineItems.name: Jennifer Bobadilla
timelineItems.text: Lol, did Altidore just get mad cause Bradley took possession? What a mess. #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Efe Ambrose (Nigeria) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Victor Moses with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Mike McCall
timelineItems.text: Besler and Cameron have drifted very far apart a few times early on. Something to watch. #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Efe Ambrose (Nigeria).
DaMarcus Beasley (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: The Soccer Desk
timelineItems.text: 14' Bedoya again with an opportunity to attack. Some indecision results in a heavy through ball for Dempsey that goes out for a GK. #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Nigeria. Conceded by Matt Besler.

timelineItems.name: Hunter McWilliams
timelineItems.text: Bedoya has range. It's better to take a long shot and test the keeper rather than give up the possession trying to force something. #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Nigeria. Conceded by Jermaine Jones.
Offside, Nigeria. Shola Ameobi tries a through ball, but Peter Odemwingie is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Goal.com Nigeria
timelineItems.text: Some fine trickery by Moses down the left wins a corner. How important is the Chelsea forward to this Super Eagles side?

timelineItems.name: Devin Rigg
timelineItems.text: Say what you will about Beckerman and Jones being paired, but our D-mid hair game is No. 1 in the world right now #USAvNGA #1N1T

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Alejandro Bedoya (USA).
Shola Ameobi (Nigeria) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Yassin Omar
timelineItems.text: Nice save Howard!!! #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Ernie Santa Cruz
timelineItems.text: The #USMNT back line is struggling. Not a good sign if Nigeria is giving them trouble. Nigeria isn't Germany or Portugal. #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Greg Maas
timelineItems.text: Altidore's ability to hold the ball up in this system for support will prove critical #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Peter Odemwingie (Nigeria) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Juwon Oshaniwa.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Duffy
timelineItems.text: Lots of freedom loving people here. @AmericanOutlaws. #USMNT #USAvNGA http://t.co/Lqx36BpGsq

timelineItems.name: Ryan Duffy
timelineItems.text: Lots of freedom loving people here. @AmericanOutlaws. #USMNT #USAvNGA http://t.co/Lqx36BpGsq

timelineItems.name: Bean
timelineItems.text: This USMNT squad never really looks as dangerous without Davis lately. #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, USA 2, Nigeria 1.

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: So, Obafemi Martins can't play for Nigeria? Psh. #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Jozy comes on strong at just the right time. #USAvNGA recap: http://t.co/KBfR0VPjZK #1N1T #WorldCup http://t.co/LadWcCGNIe

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Jozy comes on strong at just the right time. #USAvNGA recap: http://t.co/KBfR0VPjZK #1N1T #WorldCup http://t.co/LadWcCGNIe

timelineItems.name: Mike McCall
timelineItems.text: Jermaine Jones doing some nasty things to people right now. #USAvNGA #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Thomas Avery
timelineItems.text: Feels like we can't string more than 4 passes together. Our breaks are bogging down in the final third. #USAvNGA #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Michael Beam
timelineItems.text: The USA attacking third has been pretty disappointing so far #USAvNGA #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Peter Odemwingie (Nigeria) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Ogenyi Onazi.

timelineItems.name: A Seattle Quakes Fan
timelineItems.text: Dempsey selfishness count is up to 2 unnecessary moves leading to turnovers. #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  USA. Conceded by Vincent Enyeama.
Foul by Ogenyi Onazi (Nigeria).
Clint Dempsey (USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: DE Rock
timelineItems.text: Super Eagles losing possession in the midfield. Osaze shoots off target. 22min: #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Steven Horton
timelineItems.text: Whilst this game is going on, USA are playing Nigeria...Nigeria enjoying 67% possession! Wow! #USAvNGA #EngvHon

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Michael Bradley (USA) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Clint Dempsey.

timelineItems.name: American Soccer Now
timelineItems.text: Huge swell from a big crowd on Bradley's shot. They're ready for goals. #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Thomas Avery
timelineItems.text: Much better spell from the #USMNT. Very creative stuff and love the shot from Bradley. #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: ✝☀️✰
timelineItems.text: Bradley is the anchor for our counter attack #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Alejandro Bedoya (USA) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Kyle Beckerman following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Goal.com Nigeria
timelineItems.text: Odemwingie has been looking good, some encouraging movement, excellent turns and footwork...allied, unfortunately, with poor finishing.

timelineItems.name: U.S. Soccer
timelineItems.text: Dempsey and Bradley with some combination play in the middle. Bradley with a blast and the NGA keeper makes the save.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Horn
timelineItems.text: If Bedoya would have curled that in, I might have ran around my neighborhood with no shirt #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Efe Ambrose (Nigeria) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Muna
timelineItems.text: There's no urgency in our game. Perpetually trying to slow the game down. A seminar on boring football, basically. #SuperEagles

timelineItems.name: Jorge Hernandez
timelineItems.text: Beasley showing why there's no question who's our left back #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Offside, Nigeria. Shola Ameobi tries a through ball, but Peter Odemwingie is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: 50StarsSoccer
timelineItems.text: Jozy is playing as poorly today as he did well against Turkey. Was really hoping the positive momentum would continue today #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Derek Richardson
timelineItems.text: Zusi on for Altidore and move Dempsey up as the lone striker. Or abandon this formation all together. #USAvNGA #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Michael Sell
timelineItems.text: So far, I am loving this formation. Beckerman and Bradley work so well together. #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Clint Dempsey (USA) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right following a corner.
Corner,  USA. Conceded by Juwon Oshaniwa.

timelineItems.name: Colton Smith
timelineItems.text: If we lose to Nigeria I wouldn't be surprised if our confidence is at an all time low for that first game against Ghana #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Nathan Godwin

timelineItems.name: Brändön Böyër

timelineItems.name: Goal.com Nigeria
timelineItems.text: Am I the only one who's dying for the inclusion of Michael 'wild boy' Uchebo at the break? Could help us regain the initiative.

timelineItems.name: Igwe Ezra Ikechukwu
timelineItems.text: Nigeria need confidence! Playing well, but lack finishing. U can't be nervous playing at the world cup. Go super eagles! #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Clint Dempsey (USA) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jozy Altidore.
First Half ends, USA 1, Nigeria 0.

timelineItems.name: Michael Sell
timelineItems.text: Solid first half. I'm digging the formation and line up. Great goal by Jozy and great pass by Johnson. Loving it. #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Nurudeen Obalola
timelineItems.text: The Eagles are too easy to defend against. The passes have to be quicker & the forwards should make more runs in behind the US def #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Casey Wertz
timelineItems.text: 2nd half will be the real test for Ghana @ussoccer if we can keep up the speed and momentum we have, we will win. #WorldCup #USAvNGA #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Ian Eccles
timelineItems.text: 1 gl in 18 months for Bradley. Wow. As long as he delivers the ball with his vision and notches up assists, I'll take that #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Judano
timelineItems.text: The Super Eagles need to develop a winning mentality. They are too casual with possession. #Nigeria #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: 50StarsSoccer
timelineItems.text: Bradley is the most important player for US team success, but Fabian Johnson might be the most important player offensively #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins USA 1, Nigeria 0.

timelineItems.name: Ian Eccles
timelineItems.text: Solid game for Beckerman but still can't see Beckerman AND Jones starting vs Ghana. One or the other for me #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Jim Krill
timelineItems.text: Jozy is back. Bring it Portugal. Bring it Germany. Bring it Ghana. Admit it. You're scared of us. #USMNT #USAvNGA #jozyaltidore

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Chandler coming on for Beasley. #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  USA. Conceded by Godfrey Oboabona.

timelineItems.name: ColdSweats
timelineItems.text: Michael Bradley can literally put the ball wherever he wants. He is the heart of our team. #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Brother-In-The-Lord
timelineItems.text: Victor Moses be playing football like Unstable PowerBank #USAvsNGR #SuperEagles

timelineItems.name: Colin Udoh
timelineItems.text: Attendance: 52 033, a record for a men's soccer game in this region #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Andrea Chapman
timelineItems.text: Jermaine Jones is key, watch him when the Americans are attacking. He needs to be steady behind the play. #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Mike McCall
timelineItems.text: Bradley steamrolls Beasley to create that chance. NOONE stops him, not even his teammates. #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Michael Uchebo (Nigeria).
Jermaine Jones (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: John T. Meyer
timelineItems.text: Clint Dempsey can’t get by Warren Moon. #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Thomas Avery
timelineItems.text: Altidore and Bradley are having their best games I've ever seen. I'm irrationally optimistic right now. #USAvNGA #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Mike McCall
timelineItems.text: #USMNT playing an excellent match against a World Cup-bound squad. Needs to get the shutout. #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Soccerly
timelineItems.text: #USAvNGA 78' | Great run made by Dempsey but another opportunity smothered with ease. http://t.co/XxB3yCvRSX

timelineItems.name: KJ
timelineItems.text: Me thinks the #supereagles owe the entire nation an apology for such dozy performance tonight. Something isn't right with the team!

timelineItems.name: #BADDEST☝
timelineItems.text: Victor Moses played 2 games the entire season for Liverpool and he gets to be our star player #SuperEagles. Bloody English Reject

timelineItems.name: Teresa G
timelineItems.text: Aw, jozy has his twinkle back #USAvNGA #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Jamie Ives
timelineItems.text: Bradley is a beautiful footballer. So graceful in possession and a terrier when he's not. Big asset #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Graham Zusi (USA).
Juwon Oshaniwa (Nigeria) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Tomas_Danicek
timelineItems.text: Huge satisfaction for both Altidore and Bradley this is. Fans have been giving them some hard time, now they see. #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.text: Did JERMAINE Jones change his name & only tell ESPN? Cause I haven't heard him called his proper 1st name all game #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Goal.com Nigeria
timelineItems.text: Nigeria's defence are all at sea as the Americans almost lineup to take pot shots...the ball breaks..

timelineItems.name: Karl Wikstrom

timelineItems.name: Giuseppe Copertino
timelineItems.text: Omar Gonzalez needs to not play. He's a liability, doesn't have the pace to keep up and leaving the back line exposed. #USMNT #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: Tyler Pralley
timelineItems.text: That's a terrible tackle to make in the box by Besler; I understand why but still a terrible tackle to make from that angle. #USAvNGA

timelineItems.name: The Soccer Desk
timelineItems.text: FULL TIME: USA 2 - 1 Nigeria #USAvNGA #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, USA 2, Nigeria 1.
Offside, Nigeria. Victor Moses tries a through ball, but Efe Ambrose is caught offside.
